meanings.sent1: The name of that new student is unpronounceable.
meanings.sent2: The word 'onomatopoeia' is often considered unpronounceable by many.
meanings.sent3: Trying to say the unpronounceable name of the restaurant made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her unpronounceable last name was like a secret code no one could crack.
meanings.sent5: The unpronounceable language of the aliens sounded like a series of strange clicks and whistles.

meanings.definition: Not able to be spoken easily.
meanings.sent1: The doctor's handwriting was unpronounceable, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: The ancient hieroglyphs were so unpronounceable that scholars struggled to decipher them.
meanings.sent3: The unpronounceable password left him locked out of his own account.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a tangled mess of unpronounceable feelings.
meanings.sent5: The unpronounceable tongue twister left the children in fits of laughter.
